mapper.select: SELECT no,cust_id,name,email,role, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m%d') AS reg_day FROM cust_info

SELECT no,cust_id,name,email,role, DATE_FORMAT(reg_day,'%Y.%m%d') AS reg_day FROM cust_info WHERE 1=1 AND reg_day >= DATE_FORMAT(#{strStartDate},'%Y%m%d') AND reg_day < DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(#{strEndDate},'%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL +1 DAY)
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{strName},'%')
